company_name: EXPRO – Zakat Tax And Customs Authority

coverage_details.std: Covered regardless of cause. Includes Nongonococcal urethritis, Trichomoniasis, HIV, Syphilis, HPV (genital warts), Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Genital herpes, Chancroid.
coverage_details.checkup: Family doctors and adult checkups covered as per National Health Services (Weqaya) guidelines
coverage_details.vaccination: SR 9,999,999.99 (children up to 6 years per MOH schedule; adult vaccinations covered as per Weqaya/NHS guidelines)
coverage_details.optical_frame: SR 2,000.00 (frames and contact lenses up to optical limit; 2x frames for children <14 years)
coverage_details.birth_control: SR 1,500 per female (not covered for parents scheme). Family Planning (contraceptives for pregnancy) up to 1,500 SAR.
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_35: Covered if BMI > 40 kg/m2 OR BMI > 35 with complications up to 20,000 SAR; multiple specified procedures allowed
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_40: As above; see list of procedures
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Surgery for donor of life organs covered up to SR 50,000. Cost of harvesting donor organ: SR 50,000.
coverage_details.neonatal_screening: National program for early detection for newborns: SR 100,000
coverage_details.psychiatric: Psychiatric cases including non-acute psychiatric: up to SR 50,000 (includes up to 4 visits for non-acute).
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 5,000 per year, 20% deductible up to 100 SR. Includes crowns, bridges, pins/post for crowns. Scaling once/year.
coverage_details.dental_corrective: All covered within dental limit including bridges, crowns, pins/post (non-orthodontic).
coverage_details.neo_natal_care: Premature babies care covered up to annual limit. Newborn care under mother's policy up to 30 days from birth.
coverage_details.newborn_disability_screening: SR 100,000 (includes neonatal metabolic screening and congenital heart anomalies)
coverage_details.congenital: Acute congenital: covered up to annual limit; Non-acute congenital: covered up to SR 50,000
coverage_details.maternity: SR 15,000 for normal deliveries, prenatal, newborn coverage under mother’s policy up to 30 days, complications/CS/abortion up to annual limit
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000.00/year, 20% up to 100 SR deductible (frames and contact lenses covered; 2x frames for children <14 years)
coverage_details.screening: RSV covered per MOH, early hearing and heart screening for all newborns (SR 100,000)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Follows the Standard Pre-authorisation Protocol; pre-auth limit: SR 500,000.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Standard suite covered up to 4,000 SAR; companion cost covered for all members and parents; pre-existing and chronic conditions covered with medications. Rehabilitation and artificial limbs: SR 100,000. Joint replacement up to SR 50,000. Local ambulance covered. Allergy tests/treatment covered if prescribed. Intensive care covered. Psoriasis treatment covered. Infectious diseases requiring isolation in MOH-appointed hospitals covered. Home healthcare (e.g., wound dressing, urinary catheter, IV fluids post-surgery) covered. Telemedicine covered. International S.O.S assistance covered for emergency transport to KSA hospitals. Medical devices for diabetes, hypertension, steam covered. Nutritional supplements, vitamins, minerals covered if essential part of prescribed treatment (as per SFDA authorization).
